Name: Absinthe Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of star anise floated on surface.
Review: A classic Gin Martini made aniseed fresh with a splash of absinthe. Like me, you may prefer the bite-sized version of this cocktail served straight-up in a Nick & Nora glass with half measures: 75ml (1.25oz) dry gin,  15ml (.5oz) dry vermouth, and 2.5ml (half spoon) absinthe.
Nutrition: One serving of Absinthe Martini contains 202 calories
